thread.title: Villagers forced to take seven mile detour after listed level crossing closes over safety fears
thread.title_full: Villagers forced to take seven mile detour after listed level crossing closes over safety fears

author: Agency
title: Villagers forced to take seven mile detour after listed level crossing closes over safety fears
text: How about that? Villagers forced to take seven mile detour after listed level crossing closes over safety fears A scheme to repair and renew a Grade II-listed level crossing in Sussex has been rejected, closing the crossing and forcing locals to take a 7-mile detour Work on the level crossing in the village of Plumpton, Sussex which has seen the community cut in half for motorists until the new year after a planning error Photo: David McHugh By Agency
